prompt: Create a modern bottom navigation bar interface with four main tabs: Home, Search, Favorites, and Profile. The home screen should display a welcome header with the text 'Welcome Back!' in large, bold typography, followed by a subtitle 'Discover amazing content today'. Below this, include a grid of four feature cards arranged in a 2x2 layout, each with an icon, title, and brief description. The bottom navigation bar should use Material Design principles with rounded icons, subtle shadows, and smooth transitions. Use a clean white background with blue accent colors (#2196F3) for active states. The navigation bar should be elevated with a subtle shadow and have a white background. Icons should be outlined when inactive and filled when active, with smooth color transitions between states.
